item.title: Huge error, i cant fix :(
item.dc:creator: @Slyte Slyte
item.description:
@Slyte wrote:

WILL PAY 500K REAL RS GOLD FOR THIS!!!

Problem: Errors

Server Base: client,java

(optional) Rating: 10!!!

Well i was messing around adding tuts to my server. Then i tried to add one tut, but messed up a little, so i clicked undo, and when i did that it did undo but it didnt undo what i did it undoed some totally other stuff which fed up my source for client.java.

I have done SOOOO much in this file and there is no way i coudl start over. I had a backup, so as i copied and pasted it, i accidently saved my fed up source with my backup, so there goes my backup that i needed. Heres the code i tried undoing:

[code] playerLastConnect = (token2);
} else if

(token.equals(“character-lastlogintime”)) {
lastlogintime = Integer.parseInt(token2);
} else if (token.equals(“character-kitstarter”)) {
kitstarter =

Integer.parseInt(token2);

					} else if (token.equals("character-ancients"))

{[/code]
